alert.note: Alert for Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 16 at 4:09AM MDT until October 17 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Overnight low temperatures of 28 to 32 degrees. * WHERE...Sacramento mountains above 7500 ft. * WHEN...Tonight into Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Sub-freezing temperatures may damage sensitive vegetation. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As temperatures drop, a mix of rain and snow will be possible through the night and into Monday morning for the highest elevations.
info.instruction: A Freeze Warning means sub-freezing temperatures are imminent or highly likely. These conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
